column4: how does one get MP3 ripping in Intrepid with Sound Juicer or Banshee? gstreamer0.8-lame is no longer in the repositories.
and yet they are broken on my laptop
I'm using the open source DRI drivers for my ATI since they're no longer supported by fglrx. They work well
Intel drivers suck, they are broken in Intrepid for GM965... really low performance
